page.title: 09Schooling in Tongue
page.content: Tongue Primary School caters for children between the ages of 5 and 12 years. The seven classes are in two groups because there are only 31 child ren and two teachers. The school was built in 1964 ona site which overlooks the Kyle and from it one can see for miles in all directions. Children come in from the village and the surround ing area, up to seven miles away, each day, and most of them have lunch in school. After Primary School the children move to Secondary School 13 miles east, and then perhaps eventual ly to the six year school on the east coast where they have to stay in hostels. Tongue School is bright and clean, witha GP room as well as the two class rooms and dining room.
